channel.title: Version 5.0 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.0.0 (2022-07-05) Break'n Break'n Th' theme changed how JavaScript an' CSS dependencies be boarded t' provide a better performance. In case youâ€™ve added own JavaScript code that depends on th' themes jQuery implementat'n, ye have t' put it into a separate *.js file (if not already) an' add th' defer keyword t' th' script element. Eg.
